entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
